---
title: "New Release: American Arson - A Line In The Sand"
date: "2020-07-05"
coverImage: "alineinthesand.jpg"
---

**Release Date:** June 3, 2020 **Record Label:** Facedown Records

**Genre:** Punk rock **Album length:** 10 tracks: 38 minutes

1\. The End 2. Drop Your Daggers 3. Forever 4. Unbreakable 5. Stay True 6. The Waters Will Rise 7. Let Conviction Grow 8. Huddled Masses 9. Wolf Pack 10. The King Is Alive

[Facbook](https://web.facebook.com/americanarson/)

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ByePMSOjNjQ

Unbreakable I spun the wheel and headed north and landed on the shore.

I felt the panic setting in, the war beneath my skin; dramatic scenes with violins, where I never win.

Lately, I’ve felt those apparitions try to take me, but I know when you wrap your love around me,

the sky might crack, the sun may fade away, but I’m gonna stay unbreakable.

I feel it coming again, I feel it coming again. I drew a line in the sand. I’m not backing down.

I feel it coming again, I feel it coming again. I drew a line in the sand. I’m not moving.

Lately, I’ve felt those apparitions try to take me, but I know when you wrap your love around me,

the sky might crack, the sun may fade away, but I’m gonna stay unbreakable.

Lately, I’ve felt those apparitions try to take me, but I know when you wrap your love around me,

the sky might crack, the sun may fade away, but I’m gonna stay unbreakable.
